title: Diamond Floral Haaram Set with Jhumkas
features: Intricate floral design with cascading diamond-studded motifs. The central pendant features a larger floral motif with a central emerald stone. Small pearls are dangling on both ends of the floral design to give more elegance. The jhumka earrings complement the haaram with matching floral design and a dangling pearl, mirroring the Haaram's aesthetic. The craftsmanship showcases a fine balance of traditional South Indian design with modern setting techniques.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Also suitable for upscale social gatherings and cultural events where a touch of traditional elegance is desired.
description: This diamond haaram set is a masterpiece of Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The use of high-quality diamonds and natural pearls, combined with the timeless floral design, makes it a valuable heirloom. The intricate detailing and perfect color coordination elevate its aesthetic appeal, ensuring it will be a cherished piece for generations. The set's design blends traditional and modern elements for versatility, and can be customized.
